briefTitle: Study to Investigate Safety and Tolerability of Intravenous Lacosamide in Children.
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-Label Study to Investigate the Safety and Tolerability of Intravenous Lacosamide in Children (>= 1 Month to < 17 Years of Age) With Epilepsy
summary: EP0060 is a multicenter, open-label study to evaluate the safety and tolerability of intravenous (iv) Lacosamide (LCM) in pediatric subjects \>= 1 month to \< 17 years of age with epilepsy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With at Least One Adverse Event Reported Spontaneously by the Participant/or Caregiver (Including Parent/Legal Guardian) or Observed by the Investigator During the Study
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From Screening Period (Day -7 to Day -1) up to the End-of-Study Period (up to Day 37)
